EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that their request is not handled by the WRF Process
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Unable to Process
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Unable to Process: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}.
Unfortunately, this particular request type is not one that is processed by a team assigned through the WRF process.
Please contact the following for assistance with your request:
Thank you,
BSD BIDS
